9.1.17  5:24 pm   Sorry for doubting you but why did it take 11 months to do HOTEWIG?

     I can't possibly pretend to know your workflow and pace,

      but 11 months seem like a really long time. Like an absurdly long time.

     If you hadn't told me, I would've guessed that a single person made HOTEWIG in perhaps 3 months. 11 months. Wew. Sorry for making such a big deal out of it, it's just that I've never worked on a single thing for that long. Kudos to you.
